plot: Developer J. Bricket Armstrong is out to buy up all the land in Hondo Valley. but rancher &"Pop&" Robinson won't sell his because of a promise he made his son, killed in WWII, and he also is housing a stranded band of show-business troupers. But, foreclosure is on the horizon, but the troupers put on a Big Show, and rodeo-performer Jack Norman kicks in his winnings from the Smoky River Rodeo to save the old Homestead.   Written by  Les Adams
title: Smoky River Serenade
